name: Time Spacer
description:
You are in space with Aliens invasion with also distortion in time. 

Explore the space while avoiding the Aliens or destroy them

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys for movement.

Space for fire.

Share with us your highest score!

Assets: 

https://www.kenney.nl/ for 2D Sprites and for 3D models

Google for images of meteors satellites and other stuffs.
